title: Justice triumphing, or, The spoylers spoyled laid forth in a gratulatory sermon for the miraculous discovery of, and our glorious delivery from the barbarous powder-plot / preached at Pauls, November the 5th, 1646 by Nathanael Hardy ...
author: Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
publisher: Printed by R.L. for Nathanael Webb and Wilfram Grantham ...,
